phrases: I was at a birthday party...rammed my back into the railing of the staircase. And maybe a twisting.
If I'm lying flat it hurts a little more, and any twisting motion for sure.
It doesn't appear to have any compression fractures or anything that... essentially, except for the fusion, a normal exam.
You have a strain of your lower back.
Continue the Motrin at 800mg, three times a day with food. I want you to use some ice and heat, alternating on your back. But I do want you walking.
If it's not [improving], or it's getting worse, I want you to come back and see me over the next week.
